backend

Interface IIdsTariffManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    IdsTariffManager

    public interface IIdsTariffManager
    This interface represents tariff manager for computation IDS JMK price and tariff.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      OptimalTicket getPrice(java.util.List<Path> paths, boolean weekend, int countAdults, int countChildren)
      Return price according IDS JMK tariff XML file for a given path

    • Method Detail

      • getPrice

        OptimalTicket getPrice(java.util.List<Path> paths,
                     boolean weekend,
                     int countAdults,
                     int countChildren)
        Return price according IDS JMK tariff XML file for a given path
        Parameters:
        paths - list of non-transferable paths
        weekend - true if non working day, false otherwise
        countAdults - count adults
        countChildren - count children under 15 years
        Returns:
        the cheapest ticket for given parameters of group
        Throws:
        ServiceException - when XML DB operation fails
        ValidationException - when XML data source breaks validation rules
        IllegalEntityException - when path breaks validation rules
